s.text: When you were asked about that, you said you didn't even know anything about it ...
Could you just talk about each one and talk about how you think that's caused the party's image to go off track and how that informs what you're trying to do now?

This concerned a federal investigation into whether Giuliani was "improperly denying benefits for some recipients."
Bush was asked no questions about education and only one about welfare.
